name: Honey Boy
description: A young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father and deal with his mental health.

review.author: guerrilawarfare
review.heading: Definitive Oscar Snub of 2020
review.reviewBody: Most well acted movie I have seen in 2020. The direction, writing, and cinematography were all amazing. The fact that this is not nominated for a single Oscar is atrocious. How anyone could say Pitt or Hanks put in even close to the effort and performance Shia did is asinine.

keywords: father son relationship,motel,12 year old,child actor,1990s
